uniques: Rebel units may spawn <upon declaring war with a major Civilization> <when below [0] Happiness> <with [67]% chance>
Rebel units may spawn <when at war> <when below [-10] Happiness> <with [100]% chance>
Rebel units may spawn <upon conquering a city> <with [100]% chance>
Rebel units may spawn <upon founding a city> <when below [-5] Happiness> <with [50]% chance>
Rebel units may spawn <upon gaining a [Military] unit> <when below [-10] Happiness> <with [50]% chance>
Rebel units may spawn <upon defeating a [Barbarian] unit> <when below [-10] Happiness> <with [50]% chance>
